name: Towers (itch) (Two's Company)
description:
Towers version 2.

Towers is a fast paced head to head rune matching style of game in which the player (with or without a friend) matches runes in rows of three or more to summon a range of heroes to achieve your objective. Toppling your opponents tower!

Towers is still in active development, more units and features are being added as subsequent versions are released. We would greatly appreciate your feedback, thanks for playing!

-How to play-
The controls for each player are displayed under that players tower.
To move a square you must -hold- the select key while pressing the desired direction.
The aim is to match 3 or more of the same colour, which gives xp or creates units.
When you level up, you select a unit or the "?" (The "?" selects a random unit and destroys all of your opponents units currently in the field!)
The unit you selected is then displayed at the bottom of your tower, matching squares of that colour will now produce that unit.
You can reset the squares in your tower at any time by pressing the reset key for your tower (This does damage to your tower, so use sparingly!)
